name: Christopher Campbell
reviewtxt: Probably the best shoes in town.Going to give them 5 stars without hesitation.I was very excited about these shoes.Initially felt comfortable. I did notice immediately that the sol does not come up far enough.

name: Svyatoslav Romanov
reviewtxt: I wear these to work (the gold pair) and haven't had any issues with stinkiness, even without socks.Love the way these shoes look but the quality leaves a lot to be desired. Specifically the stitching.

name: Russian Putin
reviewtxt: Great service and great quality,looking to buy more near future! Going to use them for Joe Biden such a stupid one

name: Joe Biden
reviewtxt: Amazing products.I wondered how they managed to keep the same price from last year.recommonded to everyone buying these for my wife

name: Boris Johnson
reviewtxt: Heck with my hairs Im in love with these shoes cz they are so cheap. Also, I wouldnt be able to wear them for more than 4 hours because they offer no support.

name: Osama Bin Laden
reviewtxt: Masha'Allah walhamdulillah what a shoe!.Good luck to Biden now-a-days if I was alive I was going to make bomb and wallahi boom biden's house

name: Kim Jong Un
reviewtxt: Wow amazing shoes and so cheap as I have purchased from them so may times.I got the leopard and its a close dupe of the much more expensive Rothy!
